formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: The compiler should no longer use LLVM, but instead use C/Cuda as its output language. It should also reduce the copying overheads of the interpreter through the use of the DWA features of the system.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: This will require the changing of the system requirements and an updating of the function specification, which is already scheduled. It will also require updating the Software Architecture to include the use of the DWA system as an asset.
